      Creates a new TextSearchOperator that uses fuzzy search and does not use synonyms.

    • fuzzy

      TextSearchOperator fuzzy(FuzzySearchOptions options)
      Creates a new TextSearchOperator that uses fuzzy search and does not use synonyms.
      Parameters:
      options - The fuzzy search options. Specifying FuzzySearchOptions.fuzzySearchOptions() is equivalent to calling fuzzy().
      Returns:
      A new TextSearchOperator.

    • synonyms

      TextSearchOperator synonyms(String name)
      Creates a new TextSearchOperator that uses synonyms and does not use fuzzy search.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the synonym mapping.
      Returns:
      A new TextSearchOperator.
